TEXT.TITLE: LADD FURNITURE <LADF.O> COMPLETES ACQUISITION
TEXT.BODY: LADD Furniture Inc said it has completed the previously-announced acquisition of privately-held Colony House Furniture Inc for an undisclosed amount of cash and notes. Reuter
